ActAppropriation Act No. 3, 1977
PrecisOrder (a) approving the consolidation of and the new repayment schedule for 21 loans made to the Republic of INDONESIA, and (b) designating Mr. Ferry de Kerckhove, Canadian Ambassador to Indonesia, to sign the amendments to the Loan Agreements.
